content: this method allows you to begin in the round place marker and join to work in the round careful not to twist using scrap yarn in a contrasting color and your preferred provisional cast-on method cast on half the number of sts you need chain a few sts cut yarn & pull through loop work in 1x1 ribbing until collar measures 1 5 switch to project yarn 3 8cm see below for description of this slipping the sts you k in round 1 and purling the sts you had repeat from * to end previously slipped repeat to end total stitch count round 3 k1 move the yarn to the front and sl1 k every k st and
